item.title: GitHub + Hugo, Managing Your Blog Effectively
item.description: In the previous part, we looked at how to create a blog and apply a theme using Hugo. In this part, I summarized the results of thinking about how to efficiently manage source code with a function called Submodule, assuming that GitHub is being used. Source code structure built with Hugo Â¶ If you had previously built your blog with Hugo, the directory structure below would have been created. Rather than explaining everything, let’s look at a few necessary folders.
